title: Example of fiscal policy - building highways

content.question: Which of the following is an example of fiscal policy?

choices.label: Increasing government expenditures to build highways
Increasing the money supply to increase income
Decreasing the discount rate to lower unemployment and inflation
Decreasing the policy rate to stimulate investment
Decreasing the reserve ratio to increase bank reserves

content.answer: Increasing government expenditures to build highways

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
